ContainerServiceAgentPoolProfile.description: Profile for the container service agent pool.

count.description: Number of agents (VMs) to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

dnsPrefix.description: DNS prefix to be used to create the FQDN for the agent pool.

name.description: Unique name of the agent pool profile in the context of the subscription and resource group.

ContainerServiceAgentPoolProfile.title: ContainerServiceAgentPoolProfile

ContainerServiceCustomProfile.description: Properties to configure a custom container service cluster.

orchestrator.description: The name of the custom orchestrator to use.

ContainerServiceCustomProfile.title: ContainerServiceCustomProfile

vmDiagnostics.description: Profile for the container service VM diagnostic agent.

ContainerServiceLinuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

adminUsername.description: The administrator username to use for Linux VMs.

ssh.description: The ssh key configuration for Linux VMs.

ContainerServiceLinuxProfile.title: ContainerServiceLinuxProfile

ContainerServiceListResult.description: The response from the List Container Services operation.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of container service results.

ContainerServiceListResult.title: ContainerServiceListResult

ContainerServiceMasterProfile.description: Profile for the container service master.

count.description: Number of masters (VMs) in the container service cluster. Allowed values are 1, 3, and 5. The default value is 1.

dnsPrefix.description: DNS prefix to be used to create the FQDN for master.

ContainerServiceMasterProfile.title: ContainerServiceMasterProfile

ContainerServiceOrchestratorProfile.description: Profile for the container service orchestrator.

orchestratorType.description: The orchestrator to use to manage container service cluster resources. Valid values are Swarm, DCOS, and Custom.

ContainerServiceOrchestratorProfile.title: ContainerServiceOrchestratorProfile

provisioningState.description: the current deployment or provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

ContainerServiceServicePrincipalProfile.description: Information about a service principal identity for the cluster to use for manipulating Azure APIs.

clientId.description: The ID for the service principal.

secret.description: The secret password associated with the service principal.

ContainerServiceServicePrincipalProfile.title: ContainerServiceServicePrincipalProfile

ContainerServiceSshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

publicKeys.description: the list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with Linux-based VMs.

ContainerServiceSshConfiguration.title: ContainerServiceSshConfiguration

ContainerServiceSshPublicKey.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key data.

keyData.description: Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

ContainerServiceSshPublicKey.title: ContainerServiceSshPublicKey

ContainerServiceVMDiagnostics.description: Profile for diagnostics on the container service VMs.

enabled.description: Whether the VM diagnostic agent is provisioned on the VM.

storageUri.description: The URI of the storage account where diagnostics are stored.

ContainerServiceVMDiagnostics.title: ContainerServiceVMDiagnostics

ContainerServiceWindowsProfile.description: Profile for Windows VMs in the container service cluster.

adminPassword.description: The administrator password to use for Windows VMs.

adminUsername.description: The administrator username to use for Windows VMs.

ContainerServiceWindowsProfile.title: ContainerServiceWindowsProfile

actions.title: ContainerServices_List
actions.description: Gets a list of container services in the specified subscription. The operation returns properties of each container service including state, orchestrator, number of masters and agents, and FQDNs of masters and agents.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: ContainerServices_ListByResourceGroup
actions.description: Gets a list of container services in the specified subscription and resource group. The operation returns properties of each container service including state, orchestrator, number of masters and agents, and FQDNs of masters and agents.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: ContainerServices_Delete
actions.description: Deletes the specified container service in the specified subscription and resource group. The operation does not delete other resources created as part of creating a container service, including storage accounts, VMs, and availability sets. All the other resources created with the container service are part of the same resource group and can be deleted individually.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

containerServiceName.description: The name of the container service in the specified subscription and resource group.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: ContainerServices_Get
actions.description: Gets the properties of the specified container service in the specified subscription and resource group. The operation returns the properties including state, orchestrator, number of masters and agents, and FQDNs of masters and agents.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

containerServiceName.description: The name of the container service in the specified subscription and resource group.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actions.title: ContainerServices_CreateOrUpdate
actions.description: Creates or updates a container service with the specified configuration of orchestrator, masters, and agents.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

containerServiceName.description: The name of the container service in the specified subscription and resource group.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
